data.persona: I am a special kind of lizard. I can change colors at will. I am very hard to find because of my camouflage.
data.description:
You are in the Top of a tall tree.
This is the most majestic tree in the jungle. It spans high into the sky, with brilliant emerald leaves and sturdy brown branches. It is very healthy and spreads very wide. It flowers with brilliant violet flowers.
There's a branch, a monkey, a nests, a bird, a flower, an insect, a reptile, and a branches here.
The fox and the butterfly are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to try on the clothes I got from the fox
data.mid_motivation: I want to practise camouflaging the clothes today
data.long_motivation: I plan to become the best chameleon in the region
